item.description:
First in a series of weekend workshops with international permaculture teachers Julia & Charles Yelton.  Sunday July 10th workshop to be held 9 am to 5 pm.

Join Julia and Charles Yelton as they create a small scale photovoltaic power system suitable for the needs of this cabin.  Learn to build your own small scale efficient solar power system for under $1000.  This system will power CF or LED lights, a computer or laptop, a printer, a radio, TV, CD or DVD player (the low-draw electrical needs of a household) and can be enlarged in the future.

This one day workshop begins at 9am at Jane Sanford’s cabin at 155 Jesse Robbins Road in Belfast, Maine.  We will turn the lights on at Jane’s cabin at 4pm July 10th!  Cost for the workshop $50 - $75 sliding scale.   Space is limited.

Tea/coffee plus a lunch of soup and salad will be provided. Feel free to bring along a bread or side dish to add to the lunch table.  Please bring your own potluck kit (dish/bowl/utensils/cup, etc.) and dress in layers for the weather.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Workshop: Designing/Installing Small Scale Solar Electric System (Belfast)
